item.name: Greek Salad
item.description: Feta Cheese tossed with home-made vinaigrette and romaine lettuce.

item.name: Golden Wedges
item.description: Fluffy in the interior, cripsy in the exterior, these Yukon Gold Potatoes slices imported from Belgian are fried to perfection.

item.name: Club Sandwich
item.description: Prosciutto crudo from Italy, alongside fresh tomatoes and lettuce with a slice of sharp cheddar are incorporated into a masterpiece with wholemeal bread.

item.name: Yangchou Fried Rice
item.description: Fluffy steamed rice stir-fried with eggs, fresh vegetables and diced chicken in a wok.

item.name: Southern Fried Chicken
item.description: Breaded chicken, flovoured with a Southern blend of spices, fried to succulent crispness.

item.name: Spaghetti Alle Vongole
item.description: Freshly made pasta dough doused with a flavourful reduction from white wine and Manila clams.

item.name: Tom Yum Goong
item.description: Fragrant seafood broth served with a plate of Jasmine rice from the doorsteps of Thailand. Note: Spicy

item.name: Coke
item.description: A tall glass of ice cold Coke.

item.name: Hot Earl Grey Tea
item.description: A freshly brewed beverage using the hand-picked tea leaves from Ceylon.

item.name: Lychee Smoothie
item.description: Straight from the orchard into the glass, this heavenly concoction will definitely please your tastebuds.

item.name: Salted Egg Souffle
item.description: Delightful salted egg infused in a perfectly baked souffle.

item.name: Peach Cobbler
item.description: With the heavenly Artic Supreme peach as a filling, this delicious dessert is baked daily to ensure freshness.
